page.title: 14Living in Brixton.
page.content: I live in Brixton My house is a terraced house. It is very big. My house has a kichen,a sitting room and a living room on the first floor. On the second floor we have a bathroom, a toilet and two bedrooms. On the 3rd floor there are two bedrooms. I have 8 people in my house. My grandfather sleeps in one room on his own. My little brother sleeps with my dad and mum. My big brother has his own room and I have to sleep with my sister.I have lots of stairs in my house. My room is at the very top. Sometimes I play in my garden and sometimes I go to the park. My mum is very worried when I go out to play but I find it very safe.I just have to walk 100 yds to get to the park.I dont have to walk too far to go to the shops.My doctor is very far from here. I have to take a bus to visit.
